articles.description: Lewis Hamilton is unhurt after crashing his Ferrari during the Formula 1 team's pre-season testing programme in Spain.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton crashes Ferrari at pre-season test in Barcelona

articles.description: Australia batter Steve Smith passes the 10,000-run mark in Test cricket during the first day of his side's opening match in Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Steve Smith: Australia batter passes 10,000 Test runs

articles.description: As Real Madrid prepare for their Champions League finale, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at how the defending champions have found their form.
articles.title: How Real Madrid have found form under Carlo Ancelotti: Vinicius, Mbappe, Bellingham, Rodrygo

articles.description: Former grand prix driver Johnny Herbert is dropped from his role as a steward in Formula 1.
articles.title: Formula 1: Johnny Herbert dropped from steward role over 'incompatible' media work

articles.description: British and Irish Lions duo Josh Adams and Liam Williams return for Wales' Six Nations opener against France, along with Dafydd Jenkins.
articles.title: Six Nations: Williams, Adams and Jenkins return for Wales' opener

articles.description: Players facing allegations of doping or corruption will be able to access pro bono legal support through the Professional Tennis Players Association.
articles.title: Tennis players facing doping charge to get pro bono legal support

articles.description: In a wide-ranging interview with Gary Lineker, Liverpool boss Arne Slot says he was "surprised" by the quality of Virgil van Dijk's passing and discusses the Reds' season so far.
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk: Arne Slot praises Liverpool captain in Gary Lineker interview

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler says a "stupid" hand injury sustained on Christmas Day will not impact his play.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler says 'stupid' hand injury will not impact game

articles.description: The inaugural Champions League league phase is set for an exciting final day with 25 of the 36 teams still awaiting their fate.
articles.title: Champions League table: Points, permutations, who has qualified & how the knockouts work

articles.description: From the age of four, the Curry twins Tom and Ben have been dreaming of playing rugby together for England - now that is finally set to happen.
articles.title: Curry twins: Ben and Tom on their rise to starting for England in Six Nations
